# stop()

**Instance Method**

Ends playback of the current item.

## Declaration

```swift
func stop()
```

## Discussion

This method stops playback of the current item and clears the playback queue. You must provide a new playback queue before playing new media items.

## Starting and stopping playback

- **play()**: Initiates playback of the current item.
- **pause()**: Pauses playback of the current item.
- **prepareToPlay()**: Prepares a media player for playback.
- **isPreparedToPlay**: A Boolean value indicating whether a media player is ready to play.
